blogPost.excerpt: Robots are here to save your Valentine's Day! Send a card to your crush — you can always play it cool by saying "Look how awesome AI is") Tweet your cards & how the recipient reacted to @copysmith_ai - 1 brave romantic will win a Doordash dinner for two 💌
blogPost.body: Robots are here to save your Valentine's Day! Send a card to your crush — you can always play it cool by saying "Look how awesome AI is") Tweet your cards & how the recipient reacted to @copysmith_ai - 1 brave romantic will win a Doordash dinner for two 💌
blogPost.title: Robot Cupid by Copysmith - Write cards & poems to everyone you love with AI
blogPost.author: Tyler Hayes

localize.description: 机器人来拯救你的情人节了! 发送一张卡片给你的暗恋对象--你可以说："看看人工智能有多厉害"）在Tweet上发布你的卡片以及收件人对@copysmith_ai的反应--1名勇敢的浪漫主义者将赢得双人Doordash晚餐💌。
localize.tagline: 用AI给你爱的人写贺卡和诗。

localize.description: 機器人來拯救你的情人節了! 發送一張卡片給你的暗戀對象--你可以說："看看人工智能有多厲害"）在Tweet上發佈你的卡片以及收件人對@copysmith_ai的反應--1名勇敢的浪漫主義者將贏得雙人Doordash晚餐💌。
localize.tagline: 用AI給你愛的人寫賀卡和詩。

previous.excerpt: PDFs are cumbersome and challenging to manage with modern web technologies. The Anvil PDF API simplifies PDF filling, generation, and e-signing into RESTful endpoints, eliminating the pain of working with PDFs.
previous.title: Anvil PDF API - A flexible API for creating, filling, and signing PDFs.

localize.description: PDFs是繁琐的，并且对现代网络技术的管理具有挑战性。Anvil PDF API简化了PDF的填充、生成和电子签名到RESTful终端，消除了使用PDF的痛苦。
localize.tagline: 一个灵活的API，用于创建、填充和签署PDF文件。

localize.description: PDFs是繁瑣的，並且對現代網絡技術的管理具有挑戰性。Anvil PDF API簡化了PDF的填充、生成和電子簽名到RESTful終端，消除了使用PDF的痛苦。
localize.tagline: 一個靈活的API，用於創建、填充和簽署PDF文件。

next.excerpt: Not very popular on Twitter? Prefer Android to iPhone? At Scrubhouse, we've got you covered! Come join the conversation with the rest of us.
next.title: Scrubhouse - Drop-in audio chat for the rest of us

localize.description: 在Twitter上不太受欢迎？更喜欢Android而不是iPhone？在Scrubhouse，我们已经为你准备好了! 快来加入我们的对话。
localize.tagline: 我们其余人的即时语音聊天

localize.description: 在Twitter上不太受歡迎？更喜歡Android而不是iPhone？在Scrubhouse，我們已經爲你準備好了! 快來加入我們的對話。
